traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.desc: On each of his turns, Narth can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage. Narth carries twenty crossbow bolts.
